alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 6:06PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NATRONA AND EAST CENTRAL FREMONT COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM MDT... At 605 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ethete to 10 miles south of Ervay. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Arapahoe and Ethete around 610 PM MDT. Riverton around 615 PM MDT. Ervay around 620 PM MDT. Castle Gardens around 625 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Wind River Basin
